a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global plastic production with projections, 1950 to 2060
Annual production of polymer resin and fibers. Projections are based on the "business-as-usual" scenario which
assumes that current policies remain unchanged in the foreseeable future.
Data source: Geyer et al. (2017); OECD (2022)
